This is the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the man all tattered and torn that kissed the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the house that Jack built the man all tattered and torn that kissed the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the dog that worried the house that Jack built the man all tattered and torn that kissed the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
This is the rat that ate the dog that worried the house that Jack built the man all tattered and torn that kissed the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the malt that lay in the farmer sowing his corn that kept the cat that killed the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed.
